participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and sociable, Emily loves to share her interests and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i like to take walks. i do not drink soda. i have a boyfriend. i live in a house.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and practical, Jake is passionate about his work and values the lessons he learned from his father.
participant_2.background: i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. my cats are very special to me.
